headline: U.S. Transformers Industry Research Report 2025-2030 | GE Vernova, Eaton, and Siemens Energy Lead the Moderately Consolidated $1.49 Bn Market
summary: The U.S. transformer market is set to expand at a CAGR of 7.06% from 2024 to 2030, driven by digitalization and grid modernization. Innovations by companies like VIE Technologies, RESA Power, and Reinhausen Manufacturing highlight the adoption of AI and smart technologies. Utilities are upgrading infrastructure with IoT and DOE funding, tapping into the demand for renewables and EV support. Dominated by liquid-immersed transformers, the market adapts to dynamic power requirements, with segments
